MPL_CharacteristicCodeType.description:
Code list: CL771 
----------------------------------------- 
1 = KLW item a 
2 = KLW item b 
3 = KalfOK item a 
4 = KalfOK item b 
5 = KalfOK item c 
etc., etc.

MPL_CharacteristicDomainCodeType.description:
Code list CL770 :
101 = KalfOK score (GD) 
102 = PBB (Periodiek BedrijfsBezoek, GD) 
103 = CDM (Continue DiergezondheidsMonitor, GD) 
104 = KKM (keuring apparatuur, GD) 
105 = Kalversterfte (GD) 
106 = KK (KoeKompas) 
107 = Klimaatscore (KLW) 
108 = Biodiversiteit score (KLW) 
109 = Weidegang indicator (Zuivel)

111 = Natuur & landschap 
112 = DDD (Dierdagdosering, MediRund)

aggregationLevelCodeType.description:
listID = CL780:

11 = actual measurement, one moment in time 
12 = average over start-end period 
13 = accumulated over start-end period 
14 = average since first delivery

dairyCompany.description: The dairy company that processes the milk.

dairyCompanyIdentifier.description:
Within the scope of this data exchange, unique identifier of this dairy company.
In the Netherlands: Fabrieksnummer.

items.description: The option to add an extra, secondary, identifier of this dairy company, e.g. a GLN.

data.description: The root of the hierarchical structured data set.

legalEntity.description: The legal entity of the farm or a company (the holding).

legalEntityIdentifier.description: In the Netherlands the legal entity is identified with a chamber of commerce number (KvK) or a BRS.

items.description:
Option the add an extra, secondary, identifier of this legal entity.
In the Netherlands, besides the KvK-number a BRS might be added.

measurementType.description: Standard data type for expressing the value of a measurement. To be used for all types of measurement in this class model.

unitCode.description: The code that refers to the standard unit or dimension to express the value of theis measurement. E.g. KGM for kilogram.

value.description: Expresses the measured value of the measurement.

measurementUnitCodeType.description:
listID = CL020 
------------------------------ 
KGM = kilogram 
LTR = liter 
NBR = number (aantal) 
GL = gram per liter 
GRM100GRM = gram per 100 gram 
CEL = degree Celsius 
P1 = percent 
M1 = milligram per liter 
MGM100GRM = milligram per 100 gram 
NBRKGM = aantal per kilogram
NONE = no unit of measurement
KVEML = KVE per millilitre
MGMKG = milligram per kilogram
KCELMLT = 10^3 cells per ml
MM100GRM = millimole/100 gram 
PH = acidity
MCLTR = microgram per liter
MC100GRM = microgram per hectogram
DAY = day
MONTH = month
ANN = year

milkDelivery.description:
Milk delivery event, meaning the emptying of the milk tank of this milk production location. The milk is taken from the milk tank and delivered to the dairy company to be processed.
In the Netherlands: a visit of a RMO.

milkDeliveryId.description:
Within the domain of the dairy company, unique identifier for this milk delivery.
In case of Qlip, the identifier (15 characters) is a concatenation of:
	- dairy factory identifier (3 characters) (in Dutch: fabrieksnummer)
	- delivery data (6 characters)
	- dairy collection identifier (unique within the scope of the dairy factory) (4 characters) (in Dutch: ritnummer)
	- intake identifier (unique within the domain of the dairy collection identifier)). (2 characters) (in Dutch: inname nummer)
In case of RFC the factory identifier is: 001.

milkDeliveryDateTime.description:
Timestamp for this milk delivery.
In the Netherlands: ADED 201731.

milkDeliveryDelInd.description: Indicator (true, false) that this record should be deleted (true) by the receiving party.

items.description:
The within this event, delivered quantity of milk.
Can be expressed in litres and/or in kilograms.

factorLitresToKilogram.description: Factor to  convert a quantity of milk expressed in litres into a quantity of milk expressed in kilograms.

milkTemperature.description: The temperature of the delivered milk.

remark.description: A remark concerning this delivery of milk.

milkProductionLocationIdentifier.description:
For the Netherlands, the primary key for a production location is the ftn (RFC) or ubn.
For Belgium it is the ProductieÃ«enheidnummer.

items.description: The option to add an extra, secondary, identifier for this production location.

milkProductionLocationCharacteristic.description: A set of general characteristics about this dairy farm.

mPL_CharacteristicDateTime.description: Time stamp of the moment this characteristic was determined.

mPL_CharacteristicDeletionIndicator.description:
True = this data element is deleted
False = this data element is not deleted.

mPL_CharacteristicDescription.description:
Short name of the domain of this characteristic.
In the Netherlands for instance: KringLoopWijzer.

mPL_CharacteristicDomainCode.description:
Specifies the domain of the characteristic.
For the Netherlands for instance: KLW (KringLoopWijzer), weidegang indicator, fosfaatrecht, carbon footprint, etc.

mPL_CharacteristicOriginReferenceId.description:
Reference to the origin of this production unit characteristic, in case this differs from the dairy company that processed the milk of this production location.
E.g. for The Netherlands: KLW, MediRund, GD, etc.

mPL_CharacteristicPeriodEndDate.description: End date-time of the period the characteristic applies to.

mPL_CharacteristicPeriodStartDate.description: Begin date-time of the period the characteristic applies to.

milkProductionLocationCharacteristicLine.description: Within the domain of the MilkProductionCharacteristic a value of one specific characteristic.

mPL_CharacteristicCode.description: Code that refers to a specific characteristic of this milk production location.

mPL_CharacteristicLineDeletionIndicator.description: Indicator (true, false) that this record should be deleted (true) by the receiving party.

mPL_CharacteristicValue.description: The value of a specific characteristic of this milk production location.

valueAggregationlevelCode.description: Indicates whether this is one measurement, a cumulated value or an average.

milkTank.description: The milk tank on a production location.

milkTankIdentifier.description:
Unique identifier of the milk tank of this production location.
One production location might have one or more milk tanks.

unitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measurement for the temperature of the milk: default = CEL (degree Celsius).

value.description: The temperature of the delivered milk; measured in degrees Celsius.

partyCharacteristic.description: Generic class for the characteristics of a party that is involved in this business process.

name.description:
Name of this party.
Can be the name of a person, farm, company.

streetNameAndNumber.description: Street name and number of the visitors address of this party.

postalCodeLocation.description: Postal code of the visitors address of this party.

cityName.description: City name of the visitors address of this party.

countryCode.description: country code of the visitors address of this party.

postBoxNumber.description: Post box number of the mail address of this party.

postalCodePostBox.description: Postal code of the mail address of this party.

cityNamePostBox.description: City name of the mail address of this party.

countryCodePostBox.description: Country code of the mail address of this party.

vat_Number.description: Value added tax number of this party.

personToContact.description: Name of the person to contact of this party.

url.description: URL of the website of this party.

partyIdType.description: Standard data segment for the unique identifier of a party.

scheme.description: Indicator of what type of identifier is used to identify the party. E.g., a GLN, KvK, customer ID, etc.

id.description: The value of the party identifier.

partySchemeCodeType.description:
schemaID = nl.cl709:

nl.ubn = uniek bedrijfsnummer 
nl.kvk = Kamer van Koophandel nummer 
nl.plnt = fabrieksnummer 
nl.brs = bedrijfsregistratienummer 
gln = global location number GS1 
be.pen = productieeenheidnummer BelgiÃ« 
nl.ftn = fabrieksnummer + tanknummer 
nl.memnr = lidnummer 
nl.notsp = not specified 
nl.tnk = tanknummer 
nl.ref = allocated by generating party 
nl.vat = btw-nummer 
nl.skal = skal nummer 
cusnr = klantnummer

qualityCharacteristicCodeType.description:
For this, code list 'CL762 Melkonderzoek codering Qlip' is used. Partico dairy companies and Royal Friesland Campina use the same codelist (CL762) for these characteristics. The code list is maintained by Qlip.
In Dutch: betreft in EDI-Zuivel-oud codelijst MELKONDZ (Qlip-nummers melkonderzoek v27nov17.xls).
1 = coligetal 
2 = reinheid 
3 = kiemgetal 
4 = chloroform 
5 = boterzuur 
6 = celgetal 
21 = vetgehalte 
22 = eiwitgehalte 
23 = lactosegehalte
etc, etc.

quantityLine.description:
Optional, more detailed specification about the delivered quantities of the basic components of  the raw milk: fat, protein, lactose, ureum.
Can be expressed in kilogram or in a percentage. The unit that is to be used (kg, liters or %) is indicated by measurementType.

quantityCharacteristicCode.description: Code, indicating whether it concerns the quantity of fat, protein, lactose or ureum.

quantityCharacteristicDelInd.description:
True =  this data has been deleted
False = this data has not been deleted

quantityCharacteristicValue.description: The quantity of fat, protein, lactose or ureum.

quantityCharacteristicUnit.description: The unit used to express the delivered quantity.

qualityCharacteristicDescription.description: Short name of a component of raw milk.
